caption:
This is a captivating nighttime photograph of Niagara Falls. The image captures the falls illuminated by bright, colorful lights that bathe the water in vibrant shades of purple, pink, and traces of white. The cascading waters glow mystically, creating a soft, ethereal effect against the dark backdrop of the night.

In the background, there is a sparkling cityscape. Several bright stars of light, probably emanating from street lamps and architectural lighting, add a contrasting brilliance against the darker sky. These lights cast reflections on the water's surface, enhancing the interplay of light and dark in the scene.

The exposure and lighting effects create a magical atmosphere, emphasizing both the powerful natural beauty of the falls and the human-made luminosity that highlights its features at night. The image successfully blends natural and human elements, offering a surreal, picturesque representation of this famous landmark.
title: The American Niagara Falls at night, viewed from Prospect Park at the base of the falls on the United States side
